struct asmjit::x86x64::GpReg
#include <x86defs.h>

X86/X64 Gpb/Gpw/Gpd/Gpq register.

Public Functions

Create a dummy Gp register.

Create a reference to other Gp register.

Create a custom Gp register.

GpReg(const _NoInit &)

Create non-initialized Gp register.

Clone BaseReg operand.

Set register size.

Set register code.

Set register type and index.

GpReg & setType(uint32_t type)

Set register type.

Set register index.
